form.label: Passed Guest Authentications and Corp Guest Authentications for All Users

html.p: This dashboard and these panels display passed guest information by location and provide guest user details.

chart.title: Guest Access by Location
chart.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise-guest-authentication Location="*" | chart count by Location

table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise-guest-authentication Location="*" IdentityGroup="*" UserType="GuestUser" | fillnull value="NULL" Framed_IP_Address | table AuthenticationIdentityStore Calling_Station_ID EndPointMACAddress Framed_IP_Address IdentityGroup NAS_IP_Address PortalName UserName UserType _time | `format_field_names`

chart.title: Corporate Guest Authentication
chart.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise-guest-authentication UserType="CWA" UserName="*" | chart count by UserName | rename UserName AS "User Name"

table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise-guest-authentication UserType="CWA" UserName="*" | fillnull value="NULL" Framed_IP_Address | table UserName Framed_IP_Address AuthenticationIdentityStore IdentityGroup UserType PortalName | `format_field_names`
